main event: An embassy official reported a sighting of a bright metallic silver object over Cyprus on October 20, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as having the shape of a hot glare and was metallic silver in color., The sighting was done through ground visual observation., The object made no sound and left no trail., The conclusion of the report suggested it was probably an aircraft., The sighting was documented in a follow-up report dated December 5, 1954.
